title: Disintegrate
content:
Range: 9m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: DEX Save

How to Acquire Disintegrate

Disintegrate can be acquired by the following classes: Sorcerer, Wizard Disintegrate can be cast by using the following Items: ???

Sorcerer, Wizard

Disintegrate Tips & Notes

Synergises well with Spells such as 'Bane' or 'Slow', that which can lower a target's Dex Saving Throw score, reducing the target's chance to resist 'Disintegration'. Disintegrate will ALWAYS succeed against Sleeping targets. Regardi
